mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.projectcode AS "projectcode", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.circulaamt AS "circulaamt", a.circulaloanrate AS "circulaloanrate", a.circularate AS "circularate", a.langloanrate AS "langloanrate", a.langrepaytype AS "langrepaytype", a.repayyear AS "repayyear", a.shortloanrate AS "shortloanrate", a.receivacount AS "receivacount", a.fuelcount AS "fuelcount", a.origincount AS "origincount", a.watercount AS "watercount", a.cashcount AS "cashcount", a.heatcostdisprop AS "heatcostdisprop", a.heatcapdisprop AS "heatcapdisprop", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_costfecf( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, projectcode, projectname, circulaamt, circulaloanrate, circularate, langloanrate, langrepaytype, repayyear, shortloanrate, receivacount, fuelcount, origincount, watercount, cashcount, heatcostdisprop, heatcapdisprop, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{circulaamt}, #{circulaloanrate}, #{circularate}, #{langloanrate}, #{langrepaytype}, #{repayyear}, #{shortloanrate}, #{receivacount}, #{fuelcount}, #{origincount}, #{watercount}, #{cashcount}, #{heatcostdisprop}, #{heatcapdisprop}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_costfecf SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, projectcode = #{projectcode}, projectname = #{projectname}, circulaamt = #{circulaamt}, circulaloanrate = #{circulaloanrate}, circularate = #{circularate}, langloanrate = #{langloanrate}, langrepaytype = #{langrepaytype}, repayyear = #{repayyear}, shortloanrate = #{shortloanrate}, receivacount = #{receivacount}, fuelcount = #{fuelcount}, origincount = #{origincount}, watercount = #{watercount}, cashcount = #{cashcount}, heatcostdisprop = #{heatcostdisprop}, heatcapdisprop = #{heatcapdisprop}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
